channel.title: How do i make an item apear in someones invi when they hit 99/135 in a stat
channel.description:
how do i make an item apear in someones invi when they hit 99/135 in a stat
plz help

item.title: How do i make an item apear in someones invi when they hit 99/135 in a stat
item.dc:creator: @Deformed Deformed
item.description:
@Deformed wrote:

case 0: // Attack levelup sendFrame164(6247); stillgfx(199, absX, absY); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level!", 6248); sendFrame126("Your attack level is now "+playerLevel[0]+" .", 6249); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level."); NpcDialogueSend = true; if (playerLevel[0] >= 99) { addItem(14073, 1); addItem(14074, 1); addItem(14075, 1); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just recived the Attack skill cape and hood!"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName +" has just gotten "+ playerLevel[0] +" attack!"); }

I’ll explain.

Search for case 0: // Attack levelup

Then highlight that all the way to the last “}” and paste Dennis’s code in.

Compile, then edit the nessecary code corresponding to each skill.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make an item apear in someones invi when they hit 99/135 in a stat

item.title: How do i make an item apear in someones invi when they hit 99/135 in a stat
item.dc:creator: @Dennis Dennis
item.description:
@Dennis wrote:

Like a skillcape? or money? ect.

Study this code

case 0: // Attack levelup sendFrame164(6247); stillgfx(199, absX, absY); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level!", 6248); sendFrame126("Your attack level is now "+playerLevel[0]+" .", 6249); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level."); NpcDialogueSend = true; if (playerLevel[0] >= 99) { addItem(14073, 1); addItem(14074, 1); addItem(14075, 1); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just recived the Attack skill cape and hood!"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName +" has just gotten "+ playerLevel[0] +" attack!"); }

I didnt really know how to explain to, im sorry.

Read full topic
